title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.
alternative_title: Oregairu, My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU, やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。
description: This romantic comedy revolves around an antisocial high school student named Hikigaya Hachiman with a distorted view on life and no friends or girlfriend. When he sees his classmates talking excitedly about living their adolescent lives, he mutters: "They're a bunch of liars." When he is asked about his future dreams, he responds, "Not working." A teacher gets Hachiman to join the "Volunteer Service" club, which happens to have the school's prettiest girl, Yukinoshita Yukino.
